description: Coefficients of Jacobi cusp form of index 1 and weight 12.
references: M. Eichler and D. Zagier, The Theory of Jacobi Forms, Birkhauser, 1985, p. 141.
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = local(A, A1); if( n<3, 0, n -= 3; A = x * O(x^n); A1 = (eta(x^2 + A)^3 / eta(x + A) / eta(x^4 + A)^2)^4 ; polcoeff( (A1 + 4 * x / A1) * eta(x^2 + A)^7 * eta(x^4 + A)^18 / eta(x + A)^2, n))} /* _Michael Somos_, Oct 24 2007 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 15 1996
